The happinesse of the saints in glory, or A treatise of heaven, on Rom. 8. 18 For I reckon, that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us. By Tho. Goodwin. B. D. Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
[10], 95, [1] p.
Printed by E. Griffin for Robert Dunscomb, in Lillipot-lane, London : 1638.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
